tagNode.name: peer

properties.help: Show Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) peer status

tagNode.command: /usr/bin/vtysh -c "show bfd peers" | awk -v BFD_PEER=$5 'BEGIN { regex = sprintf("(peer %s.*)vrf", BFD_PEER) } { if (match($0, regex, bfd_peer_value)) peer=bfd_peer_value[1] } END { if (peer) system("/usr/bin/vtysh -c \"show bfd " peer "\"") }'

leafNode.name: counters

properties.help: Show Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) peer counters

leafNode.command: /usr/bin/vtysh -c "show bfd peers" | awk -v BFD_PEER=$5 'BEGIN { regex = sprintf("(peer %s.*)vrf", BFD_PEER) } { if (match($0, regex, bfd_peer_value)) peer=bfd_peer_value[1] } END { if (peer) system("/usr/bin/vtysh -c \"show bfd " peer " counters\"") }'
